sql.name: knowhowsustainaccidenttypemonthchange
sql.item: select distinct t.c802000040 , '工单数量' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t group by t.c802000040 union all select distinct t.c802000040 , 'MSC' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c802000041='MSC' group by t.c802000040 union all select distinct t.c802000040 , 'HLR' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c802000041='HLR' group by t.c802000040 union all select distinct t.c802000040 , '其他' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c802000041<>'HLR' and t.c802000041<>'MSC' group by t.c802000040 union all select distinct t.c802000040 , '故障处理' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c802000001=1 group by t.c802000040 union all select distinct t.c802000040 , '咨询' , count(distinct t.c1) from {100} t where t.c802000001=0 group by t.c802000040
